name: Destruction Game
description:
Destroy things, then absorb the elements that you destroyed!

By absorbing elements, the car will be more powerful & will be faster!

Absorb grenades to trow them!

The goal of the game? Meh, try to make the big jump with the car, you'll need your car to have atleast a top speed of 240km/h !

Stats of the car are shown on the door !
